verses.text: \w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w after|strong="G2532"\w* six days \w Jesus|strong="G0846"\w* taketh \w with|strong="G1722"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w Peter|strong="G0846"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* James \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w John|strong="G0846"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* leadeth \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w up|strong="G2064"\w* \w into|strong="G2064"\w* \w an|strong="G1510"\w* \w high|strong="G5100"\w* mountain apart \w by|strong="G1722"\w* \w themselves|strong="G0846"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w was|strong="G1510"\w* transfigured \w before|strong="G2193"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* garments became shining \w and|strong="G2532"\w* exceeding white \w as|strong="G1519"\w* snow, \w so|strong="G2532"\w* \w as|strong="G1519"\w* no fuller \w upon|strong="G2424"\w* earth can make white.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w there|strong="G1096"\w* \w appeared|strong="G1096"\w* \w to|strong="G1909"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* Elias \w with|strong="G1909"\w* \w Moses|strong="G0846"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w they|strong="G0846"\w* \w were|strong="G1096"\w* talking \w with|strong="G1909"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w Peter|strong="G0846"\w* answering, \w said|strong="G2532"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*: Rabbi, \w it|strong="G0846"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w good|strong="G1510"\w* \w for|strong="G2532"\w* \w us|strong="G3708"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w be|strong="G1510"\w* \w here|strong="G1510"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w let|strong="G1510"\w* \w us|strong="G3708"\w* make three tabernacles, \w one|strong="G3588"\w* \w for|strong="G2532"\w* thee, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w one|strong="G3588"\w* \w for|strong="G2532"\w* \w Moses|strong="G3475"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w one|strong="G3588"\w* \w for|strong="G2532"\w* Elias.

\w For|strong="G1520"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* knew \w not|strong="G1510"\w* \w what|strong="G3588"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w*: \w for|strong="G1520"\w* \w they|strong="G2532"\w* \w were|strong="G1510"\w* struck \w with|strong="G2532"\w* fear.

\w And|strong="G0611"\w* \w there|strong="G1096"\w* \w was|strong="G1096"\w* \w a|strong="G1096"\w* cloud overshadowing \w them|strong="G0611"\w*: \w and|strong="G0611"\w* \w a|strong="G1096"\w* voice \w came|strong="G1096"\w* \w out|strong="G1096"\w* \w of|strong="G1096"\w* \w the|strong="G5101"\w* cloud, saying: \w This|strong="G5101"\w* \w is|strong="G5101"\w* \w my|strong="G1096"\w* most beloved son; hear ye \w him|strong="G0611"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* immediately looking \w about|strong="G3588"\w*, \w they|strong="G0846"\w* saw no \w man|strong="G3778"\w* any more, \w but|strong="G2532"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G0846"\w* \w only|strong="G2532"\w* \w with|strong="G1537"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w as|strong="G1438"\w* \w they|strong="G2532"\w* came down \w from|strong="G2424"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* mountain, \w he|strong="G2532"\w* charged \w them|strong="G1438"\w* \w not|strong="G3762"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* tell \w any|strong="G3762"\w* \w man|strong="G3762"\w* \w what|strong="G3588"\w* \w things|strong="G3588"\w* \w they|strong="G2532"\w* \w had|strong="G2424"\w* \w seen|strong="G3708"\w*, till \w the|strong="G3588"\w* Son \w of|strong="G2424"\w* \w man|strong="G3762"\w* \w shall|strong="G2532"\w* \w be|strong="G2532"\w* risen \w again|strong="G3765"\w* \w from|strong="G2424"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* dead.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w they|strong="G0846"\w* \w kept|strong="G3739"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* word \w to|strong="G2443"\w* \w themselves|strong="G0846"\w*; questioning \w together|strong="G2532"\w* \w what|strong="G3739"\w* \w that|strong="G3739"\w* \w should|strong="G2443"\w* mean, \w when|strong="G3752"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w shall|strong="G0444"\w* \w be|strong="G2532"\w* \w risen|strong="G0450"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w dead|strong="G3498"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w they|strong="G2532"\w* \w asked|strong="G4802"\w* \w him|strong="G2532"\w*, \w saying|strong="G3056"\w*: \w Why|strong="G5101"\w* \w then|strong="G2532"\w* \w do|strong="G1510"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* Pharisees \w and|strong="G2532"\w* scribes \w say|strong="G3056"\w* \w that|strong="G1438"\w* Elias \w must|strong="G1510"\w* \w come|strong="G1510"\w* first?

\w Who|strong="G3588"\w* answering, \w said|strong="G3004"\w* \w to|strong="G3004"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*: Elias, \w when|strong="G2532"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w shall|strong="G2532"\w* \w come|strong="G2064"\w* \w first|strong="G4413"\w*, \w shall|strong="G2532"\w* restore \w all|strong="G3588"\w* \w things|strong="G0846"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w as|strong="G2532"\w* \w it|strong="G0846"\w* \w is|strong="G3588"\w* written \w of|strong="G3004"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* Son \w of|strong="G3004"\w* \w man|strong="G4413"\w*, \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w must|strong="G1163"\w* suffer many \w things|strong="G0846"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w be|strong="G1163"\w* despised.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w I|strong="G2532"\w* \w say|strong="G5346"\w* \w to|strong="G2443"\w* \w you|strong="G3956"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* Elias \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w is|strong="G0444"\w* \w come|strong="G2064"\w*, (\w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w they|strong="G0846"\w* \w have|strong="G2532"\w* done \w to|strong="G2443"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* whatsoever \w they|strong="G0846"\w* \w would|strong="G0846"\w*,) \w as|strong="G2532"\w* \w it|strong="G0846"\w* \w is|strong="G0444"\w* \w written|strong="G1125"\w* \w of|strong="G5207"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w coming|strong="G2064"\w* \w to|strong="G3004"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* disciples, \w he|strong="G2532"\w* saw \w a|strong="G4160"\w* \w great|strong="G3745"\w* multitude \w about|strong="G1909"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* scribes disputing \w with|strong="G1909"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* presently \w all|strong="G3588"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w people|strong="G3793"\w* \w seeing|strong="G3708"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G0846"\w*, \w were|strong="G3793"\w* astonished \w and|strong="G2532"\w* struck \w with|strong="G4314"\w* fear; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* running \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w they|strong="G0846"\w* saluted \w him|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* asked \w them|strong="G0846"\w*: \w What|strong="G3588"\w* \w do|strong="G3708"\w* \w you|strong="G3708"\w* question \w about|strong="G3588"\w* \w among|strong="G3793"\w* \w you|strong="G3708"\w*?

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w one|strong="G1438"\w* \w of|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* multitude, answering, \w said|strong="G1905"\w*: Master, \w I|strong="G2532"\w* \w have|strong="G2532"\w* brought \w my|strong="G2532"\w* son \w to|strong="G4314"\w* thee, having \w a|strong="G2532"\w* dumb spirit.

\w Who|strong="G3588"\w*, wheresoever \w he|strong="G2532"\w* taketh \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, dasheth \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* foameth, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* gnasheth \w with|strong="G4314"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* teeth, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* pineth away; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w spoke|strong="G0611"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* thy disciples \w to|strong="G4314"\w* cast \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w out|strong="G1537"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w they|strong="G0846"\w* \w could|strong="G2192"\w* \w not|strong="G2532"\w*.

\w Who|strong="G3588"\w* answering \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \w said|strong="G3004"\w*: O incredulous generation, how long \w shall|strong="G2532"\w* \w I|strong="G1437"\w* \w be|strong="G2532"\w* \w with|strong="G2532"\w* \w you|strong="G4771"\w*? how long \w shall|strong="G2532"\w* \w I|strong="G1437"\w* suffer \w you|strong="G4771"\w*? \w bring|strong="G3004"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* unto \w me|strong="G3004"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w they|strong="G0846"\w* \w brought|strong="G5342"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*. \w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w when|strong="G1161"\w* \w he|strong="G0846"\w* \w had|strong="G1510"\w* seen \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, immediately \w the|strong="G3588"\w* spirit troubled \w him|strong="G0846"\w*; \w and|strong="G1161"\w* \w being|strong="G1510"\w* thrown \w down|strong="G2193"\w* \w upon|strong="G1510"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* ground, \w he|strong="G0846"\w* rolled \w about|strong="G4314"\w* foaming.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* asked \w his|strong="G0846"\w* father: How long \w time|strong="G1909"\w* \w is|strong="G3588"\w* \w it|strong="G0846"\w* since \w this|strong="G3588"\w* hath \w happened|strong="G3588"\w* unto \w him|strong="G0846"\w*? \w But|strong="G2532"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w said|strong="G2532"\w*: \w From|strong="G4098"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* infancy:

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* oftentimes hath \w he|strong="G2532"\w* cast \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w into|strong="G1096"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* fire \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w into|strong="G1096"\w* waters \w to|strong="G3004"\w* destroy \w him|strong="G0846"\w*. \w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w if|strong="G5613"\w* thou canst \w do|strong="G1096"\w* any \w thing|strong="G3778"\w*, help \w us|strong="G3004"\w*, having compassion \w on|strong="G1537"\w* \w us|strong="G3004"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G0846"\w* saith \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*: \w If|strong="G1487"\w* thou canst believe, all \w things|strong="G0846"\w* \w are|strong="G2532"\w* possible \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w that|strong="G2443"\w* believeth.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* immediately \w the|strong="G3956"\w* father \w of|strong="G3956"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* boy crying out, \w with|strong="G1415"\w* tears \w said|strong="G3004"\w*: \w I|strong="G1487"\w* \w do|strong="G4100"\w* \w believe|strong="G4100"\w*, Lord: help \w my|strong="G3956"\w* unbelief.

\w And|strong="G3962"\w* \w when|strong="G3004"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G3004"\w* saw \w the|strong="G3588"\w* multitude running together, \w he|strong="G3004"\w* threatened \w the|strong="G3588"\w* unclean spirit, \w saying|strong="G3004"\w* \w to|strong="G3004"\w* \w him|strong="G4100"\w*: Deaf \w and|strong="G3962"\w* dumb spirit, \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w command|strong="G3004"\w* thee, go \w out|strong="G2896"\w* \w of|strong="G3962"\w* \w him|strong="G4100"\w*; \w and|strong="G3962"\w* enter \w not|strong="G1473"\w* any more into \w him|strong="G4100"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* crying \w out|strong="G1831"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* greatly tearing \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w went|strong="G1831"\w* \w out|strong="G1831"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* became \w as|strong="G1519"\w* dead, \w so|strong="G2532"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w many|strong="G3793"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w*: \w He|strong="G2532"\w* \w is|strong="G3588"\w* dead.

\w But|strong="G2532"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G3004"\w* \w taking|strong="G1096"\w* \w him|strong="G2532"\w* \w by|strong="G3004"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* hand, lifted \w him|strong="G2532"\w* up; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w arose|strong="G1096"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w when|strong="G2532"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w was|strong="G2424"\w* come \w into|strong="G2424"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* house, \w his|strong="G0846"\w* disciples secretly asked \w him|strong="G0846"\w*: Why could \w not|strong="G2532"\w* \w we|strong="G2532"\w* cast \w him|strong="G0846"\w* out?

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w said|strong="G1905"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*: \w This|strong="G3588"\w* kind \w can|strong="G1410"\w* \w go|strong="G1525"\w* \w out|strong="G1544"\w* \w by|strong="G2596"\w* \w nothing|strong="G3756"\w*, \w but|strong="G2532"\w* \w by|strong="G2596"\w* prayer \w and|strong="G2532"\w* fasting.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w departing|strong="G1831"\w* \w from|strong="G1831"\w* thence, \w they|strong="G0846"\w* passed \w through|strong="G1722"\w* Galilee, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w would|strong="G3762"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w that|strong="G3004"\w* \w any|strong="G3762"\w* \w man|strong="G3778"\w* \w should|strong="G3778"\w* know \w it|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* taught \w his|strong="G1223"\w* disciple, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w said|strong="G2532"\w* \w to|strong="G2443"\w* \w them|strong="G1223"\w*: \w The|strong="G3588"\w* Son \w of|strong="G1223"\w* \w man|strong="G5100"\w* \w shall|strong="G2532"\w* \w be|strong="G2532"\w* betrayed \w into|strong="G1831"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* hands \w of|strong="G1223"\w* \w men|strong="G5100"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w they|strong="G2532"\w* \w shall|strong="G2532"\w* kill \w him|strong="G2532"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w after|strong="G1223"\w* \w that|strong="G2443"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w is|strong="G5100"\w* killed, \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w shall|strong="G2532"\w* rise \w again|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* third day.

\w But|strong="G2532"\w* \w they|strong="G0846"\w* understood \w not|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* word, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w they|strong="G0846"\w* \w were|strong="G3101"\w* afraid \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w ask|strong="G3004"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w they|strong="G0846"\w* came \w to|strong="G2532"\w* Capharnaum. \w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w when|strong="G2532"\w* \w they|strong="G0846"\w* \w were|strong="G3588"\w* \w in|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* house, \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w asked|strong="G1905"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*: \w What|strong="G3588"\w* did \w you|strong="G2532"\w* treat \w of|strong="G4487"\w* \w in|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w way|strong="G0846"\w*?

\w But|strong="G2532"\w* \w they|strong="G0846"\w* held \w their|strong="G0846"\w* peace, \w for|strong="G1519"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w way|strong="G3598"\w* \w they|strong="G0846"\w* \w had|strong="G2064"\w* disputed \w among|strong="G1722"\w* \w themselves|strong="G1438"\w*, \w which|strong="G5101"\w* \w of|strong="G3598"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w should|strong="G2532"\w* \w be|strong="G1096"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* greatest.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* sitting down, \w he|strong="G1161"\w* called \w the|strong="G3588"\w* twelve, \w and|strong="G1161"\w* saith \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w them|strong="G1722"\w*: If any man desire \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w be|strong="G1722"\w* first, \w he|strong="G1161"\w* shall \w be|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* last \w of|strong="G3598"\w* \w all|strong="G3588"\w*, \w and|strong="G1161"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* minister \w of|strong="G3598"\w* \w all|strong="G3588"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* taking \w a|strong="G1510"\w* child, \w he|strong="G2532"\w* set \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w in|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* midst \w of|strong="G5100"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*. \w Whom|strong="G3588"\w* \w when|strong="G2532"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w had|strong="G1510"\w* embraced, \w he|strong="G2532"\w* saith \w to|strong="G3004"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*:

Whosoever \w shall|strong="G2532"\w* \w receive|strong="G2983"\w* \w one|strong="G0846"\w* such \w child|strong="G3813"\w* \w as|strong="G1722"\w* \w this|strong="G0846"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w my|strong="G1722"\w* name, receiveth \w me|strong="G3004"\w*. \w And|strong="G2532"\w* whosoever \w shall|strong="G2532"\w* \w receive|strong="G2983"\w* \w me|strong="G3004"\w*, receiveth \w not|strong="G2532"\w* \w me|strong="G3004"\w*, \w but|strong="G2532"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w that|strong="G3004"\w* sent \w me|strong="G3004"\w*.

John answered \w him|strong="G3739"\w*, saying: Master, \w we|strong="G3739"\w* saw \w one|strong="G1520"\w* casting \w out|strong="G0649"\w* devils \w in|strong="G1909"\w* thy \w name|strong="G3686"\w*, \w who|strong="G3739"\w* followeth \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w us|strong="G1909"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w we|strong="G3739"\w* forbade \w him|strong="G3739"\w*.

\w But|strong="G2532"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G0846"\w* \w said|strong="G5346"\w*: \w Do|strong="G3708"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w forbid|strong="G2967"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*. \w For|strong="G3754"\w* \w there|strong="G1722"\w* \w is|strong="G3739"\w* \w no|strong="G3756"\w* \w man|strong="G5100"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* doth \w a|strong="G3708"\w* miracle \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w my|strong="G3708"\w* \w name|strong="G3686"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* can \w soon|strong="G1722"\w* speak ill \w of|strong="G3686"\w* \w me|strong="G1473"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w that|strong="G3739"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w against|strong="G1909"\w* \w you|strong="G3739"\w*, \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w for|strong="G1063"\w* \w you|strong="G3739"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* whosoever shall give \w you|strong="G3739"\w* \w to|strong="G2596"\w* drink \w a|strong="G1510"\w* cup \w of|strong="G2596"\w* water \w in|strong="G2596"\w* \w my|strong="G3739"\w* name, \w because|strong="G1063"\w* \w you|strong="G3739"\w* \w belong|strong="G1510"\w* \w to|strong="G2596"\w* Christ: amen \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w say|strong="G1473"\w* \w to|strong="G2596"\w* \w you|strong="G3739"\w*, \w he|strong="G3739"\w* shall \w not|strong="G3756"\w* lose \w his|strong="G3739"\w* reward.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w if|strong="G1487"\w* thy hand scandalize thee, cut \w it|strong="G0846"\w* off: \w it|strong="G0846"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w better|strong="G2570"\w* \w for|strong="G1519"\w* thee \w to|strong="G1519"\w* enter \w into|strong="G1519"\w* life, maimed, \w than|strong="G2532"\w* having two hands \w to|strong="G1519"\w* go \w into|strong="G1519"\w* hell, \w into|strong="G1519"\w* unquenchable fire:

\w Where|strong="G1519"\w* \w there|strong="G1510"\w* worm dieth \w not|strong="G1510"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w fire|strong="G4442"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w not|strong="G1510"\w* extinguished.
And if thy foot scandalize thee, cut it off. It is better for thee to enter lame into life everlasting, than having two feet, to be cast into the hell of unquenchable fire:

\w Where|strong="G1519"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* worm dieth \w not|strong="G1510"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* fire \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w not|strong="G1510"\w* extinguished.
And if thy eye scandalize thee, pluck it out. It is better for thee with one eye to enter into the kingdom of God, than having two eyes to be cast into the hell of fire:

\w Where|strong="G1519"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* worm dieth \w not|strong="G1510"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* fire \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w not|strong="G1510"\w* extinguished.
